entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:00 a.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
